name: df-dpj
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cdpj, cmpo(s0, s1, cgrp, cima(cdm(cdprd), csn(cv(s0))), cmpt(s2, cdm(cv(s1)), co(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(cpj1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cdprd, cres(cv(s1), cdif(cdm(cv(s1)), csn(cv(s2)))))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ dProj =(s0 ∈ Grp, s1 ∈(dom(DProd)" { s0 })↦(s2 ∈ dom(s1)↦((s1 ` s2)[(proj1 ` s0)](s0[DProd](s1 |`(dom(s1)\ { s2 }))))))
comment: Define the projection operator for a direct product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
